description: This is trial for half of it.  To Fryatt Hut. Then rough unmarked trail the rest of the way via Geraldine Lakes back to car.  Only for those who know how to use a map.
directions: Head for Athabasca Falls - south of Jasper townsite.  Then up 93a towards Geraldine Lakes and Fryatt Trail head turn off.
title: Fryatt Mountain Trail and Circuit
